item.description:
EVENT: Sunday Stroll for Singles: Newton Upper Falls

WHERE: Newton Upper Falls - Meet at the Eliot T-stop (Green D Line);
Lunch at the Biltmore (1205 Chestnut St, Newton, MA 02464, phone: (617) 527-2550)

WHEN: Sunday, June 29, 2008
Walk starts 11:30 a.m. with lunch at approx. 1pm

COST: Lunch is a la carte
RSVP is required - please indicate whether you are coming for walk and lunch, or lunch only.

We'll meet at the Eliot T stop in Newton (D line) and wander with our fellow Singles from The Post Club around a little known but charming section of Newton Upper Falls, one of the oldest of Newton's 13 villages - and explore Hemlock Gorge and Echo Bridge. Maybe we'll even see the famous pothole on the corner of Sullivan Avenue and Elliot Street that was caused by the spinning bolder for many many years at the base of a now defunct waterfall. We'll end up at Newton Upper Falls' very own gastropub, the Biltmore. (Make sure to try its deep fried macaroni and cheese crouquets...highly recommended!)
item.why: Great neighborhood pub, great company, beautiful surroundings for a Sunday walk.
item.name: Sunday Stroll for Singles: Newton Upper Falls
